price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߓߊ߯ ߊ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ( ߛߘߊߒߡߊߞߊ߲ ߕߊ߭ ) ߞߐ߫ ߡߎ߬ߕߎ߲߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߔߊߟߊ߲ߞߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
